5THA.F.summary: TAV Havalimanlari Holding A.S., together with its subsidiaries, constructs terminal buildings, and manages and operates terminals or airports in Turkey, Georgia, Tunisia, Macedonia, Latvia, Oman, Spain, Saudi Arabia, and internationally. It operates through Terminal Operations, Catering Operations, Duty Free Operations, Ground Handling and Bus Operations, and Other segments. The Terminal Operations segment operates terminal buildings, car parks, and general aviation terminals. This segment also engages in the ground handling operations, as well as operation of parking-apron-taxi ways. The Catering Operations segment manages food and beverage operations of the terminal for the passengers and the terminal personnel. The Duty Free Operations segment sells duty free goods for the international arriving and departing passengers. The Ground Handling and Bus Operations segment offers traffic, ramp, flight operation, cargo, and various other ground handling services for domestic and international flights; and operates buses. The Other segment provides lounge, IT, security and education, and airline taxi services. The company also provides software and system services. The company was formerly known as Tepe Akfen Vie Yatirim Yapim ve Isletme A.S. and changed its name to TAV Havalimanlari Holding A.S. in August 2006. TAV Havalimanlari Holding A.S. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

5THA.SG.summary: TAV Havalimanlari Holding A.S., together with its subsidiaries, constructs terminal buildings, and manages and operates terminals or airports in Turkey, Georgia, Tunisia, Macedonia, Latvia, Oman, Spain, Saudi Arabia, and internationally. It operates through Terminal Operations, Catering Operations, Duty Free Operations, Ground Handling and Bus Operations, and Other segments. The Terminal Operations segment operates terminal buildings, car parks, and general aviation terminals. This segment also engages in the ground handling operations, as well as operation of parking-apron-taxi ways. The Catering Operations segment manages food and beverage operations of the terminal for the passengers and the terminal personnel. The Duty Free Operations segment sells duty free goods for the international arriving and departing passengers. The Ground Handling and Bus Operations segment offers traffic, ramp, flight operation, cargo, and various other ground handling services for domestic and international flights; and operates buses. The Other segment provides lounge, IT, security and education, and airline taxi services. The company also provides software and system services. The company was formerly known as Tepe Akfen Vie Yatirim Yapim ve Isletme A.S. and changed its name to TAV Havalimanlari Holding A.S. in August 2006. TAV Havalimanlari Holding A.S. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ADEL.IS.long_name: Adel Kalemcilik Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S.
ADEL.IS.summary: Adel Kalemcilik Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. manufactures and sells stationery products in Turkey. It offers wood-cased lead pencils, coloring and copying pencils, ballpoint pens, mechanical leads and graphite, liquid ink pens, markers, crayons, watercolor paints, erasers, finger paints, modeling clays, and gouache paints; and toys. The company offers its products under the Faber-Castell, Graf von Faber-Castell, Adel, Adeland, Atlas, Mark, Auldey, Lotus, NICI, WOW, Pinypon, Nenuco, Oddbods, and Sluban ve Adeland brands. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Ãmraniye, Turkey.

AKYHO.IS.summary: Akdeniz Yatirim Holding A.S., together with its subsidiaries, provides security services in Turkey and internationally. The company offers security services to private sector companies, as well as private security services. It also produces and sells special vehicles, as well as armored and hidden armored vehicles for the defense industry; and produces security software for public institutions and organizations. The company was formerly known as Akdeniz GÃ¼venlik Hizmetleri A.S. and changed its name to Akdeniz Yatirim Holding A.S. in July 2020. Akdeniz Yatirim Holding A.S. is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

ALARK.IS.summary: Alarko Holding A.S. engages in the contracting, construction, land development, industry, trade, tourism, and energy businesses in Turkey and internationally. It designs, develops, and builds projects, such as airports, rail systems, infrastructure systems, power plants, industrial facilities, business centers, hotels, hospitals, etc. The company also engages in the power generation, distribution, and retail sale in Turkey. In addition, it manufactures air handling units and air roof top units under the CARRIER brand; conventional boilers and condensing combi boilers, as well as related auxiliary equipment, such as boilers, expansion tanks, unit heaters, plate exchangers, and radiator valves under the Alarko brand; heat meters and heat - cost allocators under the Techem brand; and submersible pumps and motors, circulation pumps, and booster pumps under the Alarko brand. Further, it operates hotels, sports centers, spa centers, and movie theaters; publishes Hillsider quarterly magazine; constructs, manages, and operates commercial and residential buildings; and designs and offers satellite towns. Additonally, the company offers marketing of industrial products and after sales services; and tools related to real estates. It also engages in supply of water and cleaning of lake projects; and subway construction, copper facility, and road construction projects, as well as construction and installation works. Alarko Holding A.S. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ALCAR.IS.long_name: Alarko Carrier Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ALCAR.IS.summary: Alarko Carrier Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells products and services in the areas of heating, cooling, air-conditioning, and water pressurization. The company offers various heating systems, including combi boilers, boilers, burners, heat pumps, solar thermal collectors, as well as auxiliary equipment, such as hot water storage tanks, radiators, radiator valves, unit heaters, expansion tanks, plate exchangers, balance tanks, control units, and air curtains. It also provides cooling systems comprising residential, multi, and commercial air conditioners; VRF systems; air handling units; packaged roof units; liquid chillers; laminar flow units; close control air conditioners; fancoil units; humidifiers; cold room refrigeration units; and cooling accessories. In addition, the company offers water pressurization systems, such as submersible pumps and motors, water boosters, and centrifugal and circulation pumps; and engineering services consisting of building management systems, energy efficiency consultancy, and after sales services. Alarko Carrier Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Gebze, Turkey.

ANELE.IS.long_name: Anel Elektrik Proje Taahhüt ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
ANELE.IS.summary: Anel Elektrik Proje TaahhÃ¼t ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, provides mechanical, electrical, and plumbing engineering (MEP) services. The company operates through Project Commitment, Rent of Land and Buildings, Telecommunications, Ship Electrical and Electronics, and Energy segments. It provides solutions in the area of MEP operation and maintenance, low voltage panel production, recycling, and ship electric and electronic systems. The company undertakes various electrical and mechanical contracting projects, including airports, stadiums, rail systems, data centers, hospitals, hotels, business centers, and shopping centers. It also produces electrical energy from solar energy projects, as well as engages in the telecommunication activities. In addition, the company purchases and sells immovable property; and involved in Electricity and Electromechanical Contracting activities. Further, it offers designing, contracting, and maintenance repair services. The company operates in Turkey, Qatar, England, Holland, Russia, Bulgaria, Azerbaijan, and the United Arab Emirates. Anel Elektrik Proje TaahhÃ¼t ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ASELS.IS.long_name: Aselsan Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
ASELS.IS.summary: Aselsan Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the research, development, engineering, production, testing, assembly, integration, sale, consultancy, and trading of software, equipment, system, tools, material, and platforms. The company operates through five divisions: Communication and Information Technologies; Radar, Electronic Warfare and Intelligence Systems; Defense Systems Technologies; Microelectronics, Guidance & Electro-Optics; and Transportation, Security, Energy & Automation Systems. It offers communication systems, military communication systems, public safety communication systems, mobile communication systems, information technology systems, space technologies, satellite ground systems, satellite payloads, and encryption and information security systems. The company is also involved in the design, development, and integration of naval and naval combat systems of underwater and surface platforms; air and missile defense systems; land systems, main battle tank systems, and fire control systems, as well as command control communication and computer systems; and weapon and weapon fire control systems. In addition, it manufactures and develops electro-optic systems, guidance and unmanned systems, and avionics systems; and transportation systems, security systems, and energy systems, as well as traffic, automation, and medical systems. Aselsan Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi offers its products and services for army, navy, air force, and aerospace applications in Turkey and internationally. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey. Aselsan Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Turkish Armed Forces Foundation.

BERA.IS.summary: Bera Holding A.S. operates in the paper and cardboard, machinery, oil, construction and building materials, marble, textiles, tourism, and food sectors worldwide. The company manufactures cut and roll paper, school notebooks, box files, drawing papers, office files, printed or plain computer streamline forms, bind or spiral attached notebooks with hard covers, reminder note cubes, parchment papers, packaging papers, A4/A5 blocks, and background cardboard varieties. It is also involved in the production and marketing of bearings; construction of movable and folding hydraulic cranes; provision of agricultural machines; and building of electrical and mechanical bases of construction and infrastructure. In addition, the company engages in the storage of liquid petroleum gas, as well as filling and distribution as bottled gas, flow gas, and car gas; and operation of gas stations and resting facilities. Further, it provides flour, tapioca, dry foods, pasta, biscuits, marshmallows, and wafers under the Golda and Melda brands, as well as bottled spring water; sells and distributes food, hygiene products, and other consumer goods to retailers, wholesalers, hotels, motels, and resorts; and operates hotels. Additionally, the company produces PVC doors and windows, cast concrete, marble, limestone, timber goods, glass panes, and MDF and MDF lamels; polar, velsoft, corduroy, velvet, viscose, and various cotton fabrics; marbles and minerals; and micronized calcide that is used in the production of paper, paint, plastic, glue, ceramic, carpet base, vinyl flooring, and toothpaste products, as well as in the construction, food, and pharmaceutical industries. The company was formerly known as Kombassan Holding A.S. and changed its name to Bera Holding A.S. in July 2017. Bera Holding A.S. was founded in 1988 and is based in Konya, Turkey.

BEYAZ.IS.summary: Beyaz Filo Oto Kiralama A.S. provides fleet renting services in Turkey. It also engages in the automobile auction and retailing businesses; and maintaining the authorized dealership of Opel and Peugeot brands. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.

BLCYT.IS.long_name: Bilici Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BLCYT.IS.summary: Bilici Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the textile, agriculture, and tourism businesses in Turkey. The company offers cotton, polyester-viscose, and elastane yarns. It is also involved in the cotton unseed trading; and cotton and corn farming activities; and growing citrus and olive trees. Bilici Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1950 and is based in Adana, Turkey.

BRKSN.IS.long_name: Berkosan Yalitim Ve Tecrit Maddeleri Üretim Ve Ticaret A.S.
BRKSN.IS.summary: Berkosan Yalitim Ve Tecrit Maddeleri Ãretim Ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells heat and sound insulation and industrial packaging materials in Turkey and internationally. It offers polyethylene, polypropylene, and cross-linked foams. The company also provides a range of services, such as interstory screed application, wall and roof insulation, soundproofing and thermal insulation, refrigerated cooler vehicle insulation, air conditioning inside and outside tools, sound and vibration isolation, and heat and noise prevention in mechanical installations. It sells its products under the Foamex, Polyberk, Proberk, Reflekt, Airpack, and Airfoam brand names. The company provides its services to the companies in the construction/industrial, packaging, fittings, automotive, footwear/bags, sea products, children playgroup, and sports/entertainment sectors. Berkosan Yalitim Ve Tecrit Maddeleri Ãretim Ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1993 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

BURCE.IS.long_name: Burçelik Bursa Çelik Döküm Sanayii A.S.
BURCE.IS.summary: BurÃ§elik Bursa Ãelik DÃ¶kÃ¼m Sanayii A.S. manufactures and sells heavy machinery, steel castings, and industrial valves in Turkey. It offers machinery factory products, including track-mounted mobile crushers, impact and cone crushers, stationary and semi-mobile stone crushing machineries, jaw crushers, hammer crushers, sand machines, vertical shaft impactors, feeders, and vibrating screens for crushing-screening-washing plants in the aggregate and mining sectors. The company also provides diversified products, such as ship loading systems for ports, extrusion presses for Al and Cu base alloys, ball mills, and material handling systems; and factory products, such as butterfly and ball valves for pneumatic, electrical actuators, and automation applications. In addition, it offers foundry products comprising kiln rolls and rings, mill trunnions, liners, kiln and mill split gears, pinions, and other wear parts for cement industry; slag pots, blast furnace bells and rings, coiler drums, and chock blocks for iron and steel industry; marine engine parts and stern tube bosses for shipyards; and die holders for automotive industry. Further, the company manufactures ship decks, crane jibs, and adapters; finished crawling crusher units; fine/rough machined components and assemblies for cone, impact, and jaw crushers; jaw stocks, and jaw and cone crusher bodies; and hydro-mechanical parts. It also exports its products to West Europe, Balkan countries, North Africa, the Middle East, and internationally. It products are used in valve, maritime, energy, cement, iron and steel, mineral and crushers, automotive, and general machinery industries. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Bursa, Turkey. BurÃ§elik Bursa Ãelik DÃ¶kÃ¼m Sanayii A.S. is a subsidiary of Komurcuoglu Insaat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.

BURVA.IS.long_name: Burçelik Vana Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BURVA.IS.summary: BurÃ§elik Vana Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. engages in steel casting, and machinery and valve manufacturing businesses in Turkey and internationally. It offers water, lug, double flanged, two piece PTFE, and vulcanized seat lug butterfly valves; flanged 2 piece, monoblock wafer type, two/three piece threaded, geothermal, floating / trunnion flanged, welded oil and gas, top entry, threaded / socket weld class 800, and double block and bleed ball valves; cast steel, forged, knife, and rubber sealing gate valves; and casted and forged globe valves. The company also provides flanged / welded swing, forged steel threaded / socket weld swing, flanged / welded piston, forged steel threaded / socket weld piston, dual plate wafer / lug type, wafer swing, and spring wafer check valves; lubricated / nun-lubricated flanged and PFA lined flanged plug valves; sanitary strainers, and butterfly and check valves; and diaphragm valves, as well as T and Y type strainers. In addition, it offers electric and pneumatic actuators, limit switch and gear boxes, selenoid valves, and positioners. The company serves petrochemical and industrial plants, shipyards and offshore, petroleum and natural gas, mining and iron-steel, and energy and geothermal, as well as heating, irrigation, and water treatment markets. BurÃ§elik Vana Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1998 and is based in Bursa, Turkey.

CELHA.IS.long_name: Çelik Halat ve Tel Sanayii A.S.
CELHA.IS.summary: Ãelik Halat ve Tel Sanayii A.S. produces and supplies carbon wire and steel wire ropes in Turkey. The company offers steel wire ropes that are used in construction, marine, fishery, petroleum, and mining industries, as well as in elevators, chairlifts, and cranes; galvanized wires for spring applications and razor wires; and mechanical spring wires that are used primarily in automotive and white good productions, and other spring manufacturing applications. It also provides bead wires for use in tires of automobile and other means of transportation; and prestressed concrete strand that is used in bridge girder production, prefabricated construction elements, ground and mine anchorages, nuclear power stations, and silo and housing constructions. The company exports its products to the United States, Canada, Holland, Romania, Serbia, Spain, Italy and other European countries, Turkmenistan, Azerbaijan and other Turkic Republics, and internationally. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Izmit, Turkey. Ãelik Halat ve Tel Sanayii A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Dogan Sirketler Grubu Holding A.S.

CEMAS.IS.summary: Ãemas DÃ¶kÃ¼m Sanayi Anonim Sirketi provides alloyed grinding products for the cement and mining industries. It offers gear and transmission boxes, axe cases, spring connection parts; and exhaust manifold gaskets, brackets, supports, brake discs and thimbles, clutch pressure plates and frames, suspension arms, ball joints, steering connection plates, flywheels, flywheel bodies and coverings, crankshafts, water pump bodies and components, air conditioner parts, drums, hubs, motor connection clamps, spring bearings, motor caps, front supports, planet gears, brake pistons, etc., as well as hydraulic, front gear, differential, thermostat, regulator, and balancing bodies. The company also produces cast parts for use in the manufacture, machining, and assembly of white goods, such as washing machine roller bearings, and compressor bodies and cranks for refrigerators. In addition, it offers machining parts for industrial, marine, construction, boiler, compressor, hydraulic pump, heavy construction equipment, and other sectors. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Kirsehir, Turkey.

CEOEM.IS.summary: Ceo Event Medya A.S. engages in the event management business in Turkey. It offers services in the area of congress, entertainment, sports, fair, design, and corporate event management. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Ceo Event Medya A.S. is a subsidiary of Yeni ve Eski Medya Reklam Ajansi A.S.

CLEBI.IS.summary: Ãelebi Hava Servisi A.S. provides ground handling services and fuel supplies to domestic and foreign airlines, and private cargo companies primarily in Turkey. The company operates through Ground Handling Services and Cargo and Warehouse Services segments. Its ground handling services include representation, traffic, ramp, cargo, flight operations, aircraft maintenance service, etc. The company also provides warehousing and cargo services. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Ãelebi Hava Servisi A.S. is a subsidiary of Ãelebi Havacilik Holding A.S.

CUSAN.IS.long_name: Cuhadaroglu Metal Sanayi ve Pazarlama A.S.
CUSAN.IS.summary: Cuhadaroglu Metal Sanayi ve Pazarlama A.S. manufactures and sells aluminum profiles, doors, and windows and glass accessories used in architectural applications and automatic doors in Turkey and internationally. It offers aluminum facades, various raw and surface-treated aluminum profiles, OEM industrial profiles, door closer mechanisms, aluminum accessories, composite facades, cladding systems, fire and bullet resistant joinery systems, bomb resistant facades, and office partition systems. The company was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

DOGUB.IS.long_name: Dogusan Boru Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
DOGUB.IS.summary: Dogusan Boru Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells materials related to roofing, floor, and wall coverings in Turkey. It provides tiles, floor coverings, and wall coverings. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Erzincan, Turkey.

DOHOL.IS.summary: Dogan Sirketler Grubu Holding A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the energy, fuel, industry, financial services, internet, and entertainment and media businesses in Turkey. The company engages in the sale and distribution of petroleum products; production and trading of electricity from water, wind, and solar; producing steel wire ropes, industrial galvanized wires, industrial spring wires, bead wires, and concrete strands used in cranes, construction, oil and mining, ships, elevators, transportation vehicles, agricultural vehicles, and other areas; and manufacturing steering and suspension systems parts for various types of vehicles. It is also involved in sale activities of motorcycle and marine products; marketing business; mortgage, factoring, and financing activities; publishes newspapers, magazines, and books; produces movies, screenings, theater performances, and shows; offers actor management, casting agency, and video production; broadcasts network; publishes and broadcasts radio; and operation of netd.com, a video content platform, as well as hurriyetemlak.com, a real estate portal. In addition, the company engages in sale of books through its stores, as well as online. Further, it offers marine tourism services. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ECZYT.IS.summary: Eczacibasi Yatirim Holding Ortakligi A.S., through its interests in affiliate companies, engages in the manufacture and sale of bathroom and kitchen faucets and bathroom accessories. It is also involved in the sale of construction and installation materials, as well as provides after-sales services; develops and produces smart cards; and invests in real estate. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Eczacibasi Yatirim Holding Ortakligi Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Eczacibasi Holding A.S.

EGPRO.IS.long_name: Ege Profil Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi
EGPRO.IS.summary: Ege Profil Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells plastic pipes, spare parts, and various profiles and plastic goods in Turkey. The company provides PVC windows, doors, and shutter systems under the Winsa brand; PVC window and door profiles under the Egepen Deceuninck brand; PVC pipes under the Pimas brand; and glass balcony systems under the Camoda brand. It also offers uPVC profile systems under the Inoutic brand; and various PVC products under the Maestro brand name. In addition, the company provides products under the IQ AlÃ¼minyum brand. It also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Asia, Africa, and Australia. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Ege Profil Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Deceuninck NV.

EGSER.IS.long_name: Ege Seramik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
EGSER.IS.summary: Ege Seramik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells floor and wall ceramic tiles in Turkey and internationally. The company also provides glazed porcelain. It offers its products in various materials, such as wood, marble and stone, concrete, textile, brick, vintage, mosaics, mini tiles, and decorative products for used in bathroom, kitchen, corridor, garden, commercial, and industrial areas. The company was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Kemalpasa, Turkey. Ege Seramik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Ibrahim Polat Holding A.S.

EMKEL.IS.summary: Emek Elektrik Endustrisi Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells transformers, disconnectors, epoxy resin, and silicone composite products in Turkey. It offers oil immersed and epoxy resin current and voltage transformers, disconnectors with and without earthing switches, insulators, components, grading and coupling capacitors, and phase earthing switches. The company also exports its products to 118 countries. Emek Elektrik Endustrisi Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

ENKAI.IS.summary: Enka Insaat ve Sanayi A.S., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a construction company in Turkey, Russia, Kazakhstan, Georgia, Iraq, and internationally. It operates through four segments: Construction, Rental, Energy, and Trading and Manufacturing. The company engages in the construction of industrial and social buildings, and motorways; construction and operation of natural gas fired electrical energy generation facilities; and investment in and development of real estate properties and shopping malls. It is also involved in the marketing and after-sale service of construction machineries, trucks, industrial products, and spare parts; manufacturing of structural steel works; installation and establishment of the technical equipment; and excavation backfilling works and quarrying crushing operation of highway projects. In addition, the company engages in the pile dwelling work; base and superstructure construction; slip form and construction of drilling and ground surveys; organization of conventions and seminars; tour reservations and tickets sales; production of ready-mixed concrete; production and sale of electricity; repair and maintenance of power plants; and provision of architectural design and air transportation services, as well as trading activities. Further, it is involved in various activities, such as material handling and storage systems, auxiliary facilities, water treatment and environmental engineering, infrastructure and construction, control systems, and instrumentation engineering activities. Enka Insaat ve Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

EPLAS.IS.long_name: Egeplast Ege Plastik Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi
EPLAS.IS.summary: Egeplast Ege Plastik Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells plastic pipes, fittings, and spare parts in Turkey and internationally. It offers building group systems, which include waste water pipes and fittings, PPRC sanitary pipes and fittings, PVC rain gutters and down pipes, and heating system pipes and fittings; and infrastructure group systems, such as PVC-U pressure pipe systems, PVC-U sewer pipes and fittings, EGE corrugated pipes, polyethylene (PE) pipes and fittings, natural gas pipes and fittings, drainage pipes and fittings, and HDPE corrugated and PE telecommunication systems. The company also provides agricultural group systems that consists of polyethylene pipe irrigation systems and drip irrigation systems. Egeplast Ege Plastik Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

ERBOS.IS.long_name: Erbosan Erciyas Boru Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S.
ERBOS.IS.summary: Erbosan Erciyas Boru Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. produces and trades in carbon steel tubes and pipes in Turkey. It offers welded steel black pipes and galvanized pipes used in building heating, mechanical installations, and plumbing and ventilation systems; gas and line pipes used in LPG installation, boiler tubes for drilling lines, as well as natural gas, petroleum and gas line projects; sprinkler pipes used for sprinkler systems and fire protection. The company also provides industrial tubes and hollow sections for use in automotive, home appliances, furniture, greenhouse, construction, and transportation industries, as well as fence, industry and building, and solar energy systems. Erbosan Erciyas Boru Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Kayseri, Turkey.

FORMT.IS.long_name: Formet Celik Kapi Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
FORMT.IS.summary: Formet Celik Kapi Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the manufacture and sale of steel doors primarily in Turkey. It also provides cookers and heaters, including built in ovens and cookers, chimney hoods, free standing ovens, table top cookers, midi ovens, gas heaters, electric heaters, infrared gas heaters, and air curtains; and metal products, as well as accessories. In addition, the company exports its products to approximately 40 countries in Europe, Asia, the United States, Africa, and the Middle East. Formet Celik Kapi Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is based in Kayseri, Turkey.

GEREL.IS.long_name: Gersan Elektrik Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi
GEREL.IS.summary: Gersan Elektrik Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells electrical products that combine and protect systems and materials worldwide. The company offers busbar systems that are used in shopping centers, factories, hotels, schools, office buildings, transformer centers, and LV outlets, as well as distributes and transmits lighting systems; cable trays systems for use in building, airports, ships, refineries, etc.; and cable support systems. It also produces various conductors and connection parts for earthing systems; feeder pillar and distribution panel systems; G-bus automation systems; Led-bus systems; car charging systems; and underfloor trunkings. In addition, the company provides grounding and lightning prevention systems, spark gap arresters, main and intermediate distribution plates, elevated type cable supports and bauds, ventilation systems, support elements, cable combinations, cable and pipe tagging systems, and special conveyors, as well as disconnect, connect, and support elements. Its products are used in steel construction combination and fixation systems for power transmission lines, mechanical conveyor systems, buildings, industrial plants, car factories, airports, oil-gas refineries, malls, platform grills, and fixation and concrete systems. The company was formerly known as Gersan Ticaret. Gersan Elektrik Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

GLYHO.IS.summary: Global Yatirim Holding A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the port operations, energy generation, natural gas, mining, brokerage and asset management, real estate, and other businesses in Turkey. The company operates cruise and commercial port facilities; biomass power plants with an installed capacity of 29.2 MW; and power plants with 16.8 MWp installed capacity, as well as co/tri-generation with 54.1 MW of installed capacity. It is also involved in the compressed natural gas sales and distribution activities with 10 bulk CNG plants, 3 auto-CNG stations, 296 CNG road tankers, and 47 industrial-scale compressors; and feldspar mining and production business. In addition, the company develops and operates shopping centers, offices, residences, hospitals, schools, hotels, and industrial lands. Further, it offers asset management services; and securities and derivatives trading and portfolio management services to international and Turkish corporate investors. Additionally, it engages in the insurance agency, publishing, storage, food management, ship management, and marine vehicle trade businesses; and construction, maritime, tourism, and real estate investment businesses. The company was formerly known as Global Menkul Degerler A.S. and changed its name to Global Yatirim Holding Anonim Sirketi in October 2004. Global Yatirim Holding A.S. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

GPH.L.short_name: GLOBAL PORTS HOLDING PLC ORD GB
GPH.L.summary: Global Ports Holding Plc operates ports in Turkey, Montenegro, Malta, Spain, Bahamas, Antigua and Barbuda, Italy, and Croatia. It operates cruise ports for serving cruise liners, ferries, yachts, and mega-yachts, as well as individual passengers. The company also engages in the commercial port operations that specialize in container, bulk, and general cargo handling activities; and storage, logistics, and marine vehicle trade businesses. It operates a network of 21 ports. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Global Ports Holding Plc is a subsidiary of Global Ports Holding B.V.

GSDDE.IS.long_name: GSD Denizcilik Gayrimenkul Insaat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
GSDDE.IS.summary: GSD Denizcilik Gayrimenkul Insaat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in maritime sector activities. The company operates two dry cargo transportation services. The company was formerly known as Tekstil Finansal Kiralama Anonim Sirketi and changed its name to GSD Denizcilik Gayrimenkul Insaat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in August 2011. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. GSD Denizcilik Gayrimenkul Insaat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a subsidiary of GSD Holding A.S.

IDEAS.IS.summary: Idealist Danismanlik A.S. operates as a management consulting company in Turkey. The company provides consultancy services in the fields of organizational development and human resources. It also offers competency development, management development, leadership development, change and loyalty, sales management, and smart management development solutions. In addition, the company organizes summits on human resources and marketing activities. It serves the finance, pharmaceutical, fast moving consumer goods, telecommunications, and holding and other sectors. The company was formerly known as MCT Danismanlik A.S. Idealist Danismanlik A.S. was founded in 1992 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

IHLAS.IS.summary: Ihlas Holding A.S. engages in the construction and real estate, media and communications, manufacturing and trading, education, and healthcare businesses in Turkey and internationally. The company operates through Construction, Marketing, Media, and Other segments. The company manufactures, markets, and sells electrical, electronic, and mechanical kitchen appliances; durable goods; and electrical home appliances. It also operates as an advertising, publicity, and photography agency, as well as a thermal spring tourism entrepreneur; and undertakes installation and contracting works. In addition, the company publishes, prints, distributes, markets, and sells newspapers, magazines, books, and various other publications; operates news agency, and hot spring and health facility; serves as a representative for real estate and durable/non-durable goods; markets bicycles, and mopeds and spare parts; provides IT and Internet services; sets up networks; trades in computers and computer components; and invests in, builds, operates, and sells tourism and health facilities. Further, it is involved in the manufacturing, assembling, trading, importing and exporting of various motorized and non-motorized vehicles, and spare parts; construction, installation, and undertaking of projects; tourism investments and management; real estate purchase and sales; representation, consultancy, import, export, and trading activities with regard to advertising, publicity, photography, publication and advertising agencies; production and marketing of catering; television and radio broadcasting activities; food production; and operation of shipping, personnel transport, and storage and bonded warehouse. Additionally, the company operates a hospital; and provides education services. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ISKPL.IS.long_name: Isik Plastik Sanayi ve Dis Ticaret Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi
ISKPL.IS.summary: Isik Plastik Sanayi Ve Dis Ticaret Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi provides plastic products in Turkey. Its plastic products include solid polycarbonate and acrylic sheets, pet-G sheets, multi wall plates, sound barriers, non-glare sheets, flame retardant, and accessories; glasses, plates, cornered containers, caps, and viols; and masterbatch compounds. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Gebze, Turkey.

ITTFH.IS.summary: Ittifak Holding A.S. engages in the retail, food, construction, machinery, agriculture, and livestock businesses in Turkey. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in SelÃ§uklu, Turkey.

KATMR.IS.long_name: Katmerciler Arac Üstü Ekipman Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
KATMR.IS.summary: Katmerciler Arac ÃstÃ¼ Ekipman Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells various vehicles in Turkey. It offers hydraulic ladder fire trucks, aerial ladder platforms, portable ladder fire trucks, narrow field fire trucks, rescue fire trucks, remote controlled foam tower, and rapid intervention vehicles; and garbage trucks and semi-trailers, skip loaders, mini tipper garbage vehicles, refuse container washing and disinfecting vehicles, combined canal suction and jetting vehicles, canal jetting and sewage vehicles, cesspit emptier and cesspit emptier trailers, road sweepers, and hook lifts. The company also provides water tankers and water tanker trailers, bulk trailers, fuel tankers and fuel tanker trailers, tippers and tipper trailers, low bed and cargo trailers, truck mounted ADR tankers, and ADR trailer tankers; heavy, medium, and light duty recovery trucks; articulated, telescopic, and sliding platforms; comfort, trend, and classic ambulances; mobile medical clinic trucks; mobile workshops and greasing trucks; cargo bodies with cranes; and snow ploughs. In addition, it offers armoured border security vehicles, personnel carriers, ambulances, command and patrol vehicles, backhoe loaders, VIP vehicles, ADR fuel tankers, water tankers, tippers, trailers, and telescopic forklifts, as well as tactical wheeled armoured vehicles, criminal investigation vehicles, riot control vehicles and shields, remote controlled armoured tracked excavators, light configurable utility vehicles, remote controlled armoured articulated wheel loaders, remote controlled armoured dozers, and remote controlled fire fighters. Further, the company provides cranes, silo trailers, and truck mixers; aircraft refuellers and furl hydrant dispensers; painting, onboard equipment weld workship, and after sales services. It also exports its products to approximately 50 countries. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

KCHOL.IS.summary: KoÃ§ Holding A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the energy, automotive, consumer durables, finance, and other businesses in Turkey and internationally. The company's energy business operates petroleum refineries; distributes petroleum products and liquefied petroleum gases; and generates electricity through hydroelectric, natural gas, coal, thermal, and solar power and other renewable plants. It serves customers under the Akpa, Aygaz, Lipetgaz, Mogaz, Pursu, Aygaz Dogalaz, Demir Export, Ditas, Opet Fuchs, Opet, THY Opet, Tupras, and Entek brand names. The company's automotive business provides light commercial vehicles, passenger cars, tractors, buses, and trucks, as well as offers automotive retailing and car rental services. It serves customers under the KoÃ§ Fiat Kredi, Otokar, OtokoÃ§, Otoeksper, OtokoÃ§ Otomotiv, OtokoÃ§ Sigorta, Tofas, and TÃ¼rkTraktÃ¶r brand names, as well as trademarks through licensing agreements, such as Ford, Birmot, Budget, Avis, Alfa Romeo, Lancia, Fiat, Jeep, Maserati, Ferrari, New Holland, and CASE IH. The company's consumer durables business offers white goods, televisions, and air conditioners under the ArÃ§elik, Beko, Leisure, Arctic, Altus, Blomberg, Defy, Elektra Bregenz, Flavel, and ArÃ§elik LG brand names. Its finance business provides various banking and financial products and services that include private banking, mutual funds, leasing, and credit cards under the KoÃ§finans, Yapi Kredi Bankasi, Yapi Kredi Faktoring, Yapi Kredi Leasing, Yapi Kredi KÃ¼ltÃ¼r Sanat Yayincilik, Yapi Kredi PortfÃ¶y YÃ¶netimi, Yapi Kredi Yatirim, Yapi Kredi Koray, and Yapi Kredi Bankasi brand names. The company's other business offers tomato products and pastes, canned pickles, and ketchups; and pasteurized milk, as well as do it yourself retailing and marina services under various brand names. The company was founded in 1926 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

KHOLY.summary: KoÃ§ Holding A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the energy, automotive, consumer durables, finance, and other businesses in Turkey and internationally. The company's energy business operates petroleum refineries; distributes petroleum products and liquefied petroleum gases; and generates electricity through hydroelectric, natural gas, coal, thermal, and solar power and other renewable plants. It serves customers under the Akpa, Aygaz, Lipetgaz, Mogaz, Pursu, Aygaz Dogalaz, Demir Export, Ditas, Opet Fuchs, Opet, THY Opet, Tupras, and Entek brand names. The company's automotive business provides light commercial vehicles, passenger cars, tractors, buses, and trucks, as well as offers automotive retailing and car rental services. It serves customers under the KoÃ§ Fiat Kredi, Otokar, OtokoÃ§, Otoeksper, OtokoÃ§ Otomotiv, OtokoÃ§ Sigorta, Tofas, and TÃ¼rkTraktÃ¶r brand names, as well as trademarks through licensing agreements, such as Ford, Birmot, Budget, Avis, Alfa Romeo, Lancia, Fiat, Jeep, Maserati, Ferrari, New Holland, and CASE IH. The company's consumer durables business offers white goods, televisions, and air conditioners under the ArÃ§elik, Beko, Leisure, Arctic, Altus, Blomberg, Defy, Elektra Bregenz, Flavel, and ArÃ§elik LG brand names. Its finance business provides various banking and financial products and services that include private banking, mutual funds, leasing, and credit cards under the KoÃ§finans, Yapi Kredi Bankasi, Yapi Kredi Faktoring, Yapi Kredi Leasing, Yapi Kredi KÃ¼ltÃ¼r Sanat Yayincilik, Yapi Kredi PortfÃ¶y YÃ¶netimi, Yapi Kredi Yatirim, Yapi Kredi Koray, and Yapi Kredi Bankasi brand names. The company's other business offers tomato products and pastes, canned pickles, and ketchups; and pasteurized milk, as well as do it yourself retailing and marina services under various brand names. The company was founded in 1926 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

KLMSN.IS.long_name: Klimasan Klima Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
KLMSN.IS.summary: Klimasan Klima Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells refrigeration products worldwide. The company offers beverage and beer coolers, ice cream cabinets, supermarket cabinets, freezers, and wine coolers under the Metalfrio, Klimasan, Senocak, Caravell, and Derby brands. Klimasan Klima Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1915 and is based in Manisa, Turkey.

KONTR.IS.long_name: Kontrolmatik Teknoloji Enerji Ve Muhendislik Anonim Sirketi
KONTR.IS.summary: Kontrolmatik Teknoloji Enerji Ve Muhendislik Anonim Sirketi provides consulting, feasibility studies, project management, engineering design, construction management, and procurement services. The company also provides advanced process control, computerized plant information systems, software projects and support, plant start-up and commissioning, IoT, and data analytics products and services. It serves oil and gas, power generation, power distribution and transmission, process industry, transportation, mining, agriculture, and food and beverage sectors. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

KRKA.SG.summary: KoÃ§ Holding A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the energy, automotive, consumer durables, finance, and other businesses in Turkey and internationally. The company's energy business operates petroleum refineries; distributes petroleum products and liquefied petroleum gases; and generates electricity through hydroelectric, natural gas, coal, thermal, and solar power and other renewable plants. It serves customers under the Akpa, Aygaz, Lipetgaz, Mogaz, Pursu, Aygaz Dogalaz, Demir Export, Ditas, Opet Fuchs, Opet, THY Opet, Tupras, and Entek brand names. The company's automotive business provides light commercial vehicles, passenger cars, tractors, buses, and trucks, as well as offers automotive retailing and car rental services. It serves customers under the KoÃ§ Fiat Kredi, Otokar, OtokoÃ§, Otoeksper, OtokoÃ§ Otomotiv, OtokoÃ§ Sigorta, Tofas, and TÃ¼rkTraktÃ¶r brand names, as well as trademarks through licensing agreements, such as Ford, Birmot, Budget, Avis, Alfa Romeo, Lancia, Fiat, Jeep, Maserati, Ferrari, New Holland, and CASE IH. The company's consumer durables business offers white goods, televisions, and air conditioners under the ArÃ§elik, Beko, Leisure, Arctic, Altus, Blomberg, Defy, Elektra Bregenz, Flavel, and ArÃ§elik LG brand names. Its finance business provides various banking and financial products and services that include private banking, mutual funds, leasing, and credit cards under the KoÃ§finans, Yapi Kredi Bankasi, Yapi Kredi Faktoring, Yapi Kredi Leasing, Yapi Kredi KÃ¼ltÃ¼r Sanat Yayincilik, Yapi Kredi PortfÃ¶y YÃ¶netimi, Yapi Kredi Yatirim, Yapi Kredi Koray, and Yapi Kredi Bankasi brand names. The company's other business offers tomato products and pastes, canned pickles, and ketchups; and pasteurized milk, as well as do it yourself retailing and marina services under various brand names. The company was founded in 1926 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

MAKTK.IS.summary: Makina Takim EndÃ¼strisi A.S. manufactures and sells cutting tools in Turkey. Its products include twist drills, taps, dies, thread chasers, reamers, countersinks, milling cutters, tool bits, and saws, as well as solid carbide drills, end mills, and reamers. The company also manufactures specially designed products for automotive, defense, machine and white appliances, and other industrial customers. It also exports its products. Makina Takim EndÃ¼strisi A.S. was founded in 1957 and is based in Gebze, Turkey.

MIPAZ.IS.long_name: Milpa Ticari ve Sinai Ürünler Pazarlama Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
MIPAZ.IS.summary: Milpa Ticari ve Sinai ÃrÃ¼nler Pazarlama Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the real estate marketing business in Turkey. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Milpa Ticari ve Sinai ÃrÃ¼nler Pazarlama Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Dogan Sirketler Grubu Holding A.S.

MMCAS.IS.long_name: MMC Sanayi Ve Ticari Yatirimlar A.S.
MMCAS.IS.summary: MMC Sanayi ve Ticari Yatirimlar A.S. trades in fruits and vegetables from agricultural products in Turkey. The company also provides domestic and international transportation and agency services; buys, sells, and rents domestic and international real estate; and imports and exports in the field of pharmaceutical industry. In addition, it engages in the marketing and participation investments of all kinds of goods and services using various communication channels in the field of electronic commerce. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

MZHLD.IS.summary: Mazhar Zorlu Holding A.S., through its subsidiaries, manufactures, sells, and markets various plastic pipes. It offers PVC and polyethylene pipes, and related parts and spare parts; and construction, agriculture, and infrastructure related pipes. The company is also involved in acquiring and selling of stocks. Mazhar Zorlu Holding A.S. was founded in1996 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

NIBAS.IS.long_name: Nigbas Nigde Beton Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.
NIBAS.IS.summary: Nigbas Nigde Beton Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells prefabricated concrete products and reinforced concrete structures in Turkey. It offers prefabricated building systems, including general service buildings, facilities for industrial and agricultural purposes, education and sports facilities, and precast infrastructure elements; and concrete electrification poles, such as mains, lightings, electricity transmission lines, and railway catenary poles. The company also provides construction materials, which include cement based building chemicals and ready-mixed concrete; and landscaping elements, such as concrete kerb units, concrete paving stones, concrete fence poles, and concrete flowerbeds. Nigbas Nigde Beton Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1969 and is based in Nigde, Turkey.

PARSN.IS.summary: Parsan Makina ParÃ§alari Sanayii A.S. produces and sells forging parts and components for light, medium, and heavy vehicle manufacturers in Turkey. The company offers body parts, including rear axle shafts, front axle beams, and front axle assemblies; and engine parts, such as crankshafts, camshafts, forged pistons, steering knuckles, rods, pinion forgings, various gear forgings, spider gears, slip shafts, and other products and assemblies. It serves automotive, agricultural and construction equipment, aerospace, railway, and other industries. The company also exports its products to Germany, Belgium, Italy, France, Spain, the United Kingdom, Hungary, Czech Republic, Austria, Netherlands, Egypt, and South Africa. Parsan Makina ParÃ§alari Sanayii A.S. was founded in 1968 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

PGSUS.IS.summary: Pegasus Hava Tasimaciligi Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, provides airline services. It provides high-frequency services on short- and medium-haul, point-to-point, and transit routes on its domestic and international network. The company also offers charter flight services, as well as cargo and simulated flight training services. As of December 31, 2019, it offered scheduled passenger services on 35 domestic routes in Turkey, as well as 76 international routes to European, CIS, and the Middle Eastern and African destinations; and operated a fleet of 84 aircraft. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Pegasus Hava Tasimaciligi Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Esas Holding A.S.

PKART.IS.long_name: Plastikkart Akilli Kart Iletisim Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
PKART.IS.summary: Plastikkart Akilli Kart Iletisim Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells smart cards. The company offers contact, contactless, and dual interface banking/payment cards; loyalty and transportation cards; e-government and ID cards; payphone and metering cards; SIM cards; and security solutions, such as PKI cards, readers, and tokens. It also provides security printing; card personalization; card life cycle management and processing; server hosting; and consultancy services, including card based projects management and printing design consultancy, and card technology training services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Plastikkart Akilli Kart Iletisim Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Gemalto N.V.

PRKAB.IS.long_name: Türk Prysmian Kablo ve Sistemleri Anonim Sirketi
PRKAB.IS.summary: TÃ¼rk Prysmian Kablo ve Sistemleri Anonim Sirketi engages in the manufacture, import, export, and trading of cables, conductors, machinery, apparatus, tools and equipment, and spare parts and accessories for energy and telecommunication industries worldwide. The company offers a range of energy cables, including insulated low, medium, and high voltage, as well as building cables; and building, low voltage, and fire resistant cables. It also provides various telecom solutions, such as optical fiber cables and accessories, copper and telephone cables, building and antenna cables, signal and control cables, data center cables, and structured cabling solutions, as well as multimedia solutions comprising industrial communication and coaxial cables, and studio/broadcast and mobile networks solutions. In addition, the company offers nuclear, photovoltaic, ship, rolling stock, railway, airport and elevator runway, control, rubber insulated, and automotive cables. Further, it provides integrated solutions and services for downhole technology, SURF, and core cables. The company offers its products primarily under the Prysmian and Draka brands. The company was formerly known as Turk Pirelli Kablo ve Sistemleri A.S. and changed its name to TÃ¼rk Prysmian Kablo ve Sistemleri Anonim Sirketi in September 2005. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Mudanya, Turkey. TÃ¼rk Prysmian Kablo ve Sistemleri Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Draka Holding B.V.

PRZMA.IS.long_name: Prizma Pres Matbaacilik Yayincilik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
PRZMA.IS.summary: Prizma Pres Matbaacilik Yayincilik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. provides printing services. The company prints courses and supplementary textbooks, children's stories and tale books, and question bank and test books. It also engages in various printing works. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

PSDTC.IS.summary: Pergamon Status Dis Ticaret A.S. engages in the export of ready-to-wear/ready-made garment products in Turkey. It also provides export intermediation services; and tax and foreign trade consultancy services related to tax, other financial legislations, customs, foreign exchange, export, import, inward processing, factoring, and Exim loans in foreign trade. In addition, the company offers legislation and bulletin services, such as changes and developments in tax and other financial legislation, and foreign trade legislation; and information sharing services, such as information about the seminars, panels, or conferences. Further, it organizes information meetings and panels. The company was formerly known as Pergamos Dis Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Pergamon Status Dis Ticaret A.S. as a result of its merger with Status Dis Ticaret A.S. in 2005. Pergamon Status Dis Ticaret A.S. was founded in 2001 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

QUAGR.IS.long_name: QUA Granite Hayal Yapi ve Ürünleri Sanayi Ticaret A.S.
QUAGR.IS.summary: Hayal Seramik Yapi ve ÃrÃ¼nleri Turizm Sanayi Ticaret A.S. produces, trades, imports, and exports floor and wall ceramics, floor and wall tiles, sanitary ware, and granite. It offers ceramic, vitrified, granite, and tile raw materials and adhesives. The company also provides granites, such as wood, stone, marble, concrete, monochrome, mosaic, and 20 MM granites. The company sells its products through dealers internationally. Hayal Seramik Yapi ve ÃrÃ¼nleri Turizm Sanayi Ticaret A.S. was founded in 2015 and is based in Aydin, Turkey.

RALYH.IS.summary: Ral Yatirim Holding A.S. operates as a construction company in Turkey. The company was formerly known as Bisas Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S and changed its name to Ral Yatirim Holding A.S. in March 2018. Ral Yatirim Holding A.S. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

RYSAS.IS.long_name: Reysas Tasimacilik ve Lojistik Ticaret A.S.
RYSAS.IS.summary: Reysas Tasimacilik ve Lojistik Ticaret A.S. provides logistics solutions in Turkey and internationally. The company offers local transportation and distribution, automotive logistics, warehousing, railway transportation, fuel logistics, bonded warehousing, and international services. It also provides technology solutions, such as software services and vehicle tracking systems, as well as customer specific applications. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

SAMAT.IS.long_name: Saray Matbaacilik Kagitçilik kirtasiyecilik Ticaret Ve Sanayi A.S.
SAMAT.IS.summary: Saray Matbaacilik KagitÃ§ilik kirtasiyecilik Ticaret Ve Sanayi A.S. produces and sells stationery products in Turkey. The company offers papers, including woodfree offset printing, coated, photocopy, and book papers, as well as paper sheeting services; exercise books, such as PP cover, wire-o-spiral, single spiral, soft cover, spiral binding, stapled binding, glued binding, and hard cover notebooks; and calendars. It also provides a range of services comprising printing preparation, pre-printing, after printing, and post-printing services; and sheet-fed offset, Web offset, and continuous form printing systems. The company offers its products and services under the Yildiz Yayincilik, Vizyon, Papicat, and SRY,BIL brands. It exports its products to England, Sweden, Hungary, Greece, and Israel. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.

SANEL.IS.long_name: San-el Mühendislik Elektrik Taahhüt Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
SANEL.IS.summary: San-el MÃ¼hendislik Elektrik TaahhÃ¼t Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells electrical panels in Turkey. The company offers LV and MV power capacitors, LV and MV harmonic filter reactors, LV thyristor switching modules, and GE switchgears. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

SNKRN.IS.long_name: Senkron Güvenlik ve Iletisim Sistemleri A.S.
SNKRN.IS.summary: Senkron GÃ¼venlik ve Iletisim Sistemleri A.S. operates as an electronic security systems integrator in Turkey and internationally. It offers closed circuit television systems, video management software, access control systems, intrusion alarm systems, fire detection systems, emergency exit and fire escape direction units, fire extinguishing systems, perimeter security systems, video intercom systems, parking lot safety barriers, road blockers, and high speed doors. The company also provides metal gate and hand detectors, X-ray control devices, explosive and narcotic detection systems, turnstile and full length high security cabinets, public address and voice evacuation systems, electronic article surveillance systems, and artworks wireless security systems, as well as licenses plate recognition, RFID, fast toll collection, and under vehicle surveillance systems. In addition, it offers telepresence systems, guard tour control systems, bullet proof glass and safety window films, security token and asset management systems, and building automation systems. Further, the company provides project consultation, integration, aftersales technical service and maintenance, and alarm monitoring services. It serves banking and finance, and private and public institutions. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

TAVHL.IS.summary: TAV Havalimanlari Holding A.S., together with its subsidiaries, constructs terminal buildings, and manages and operates terminals or airports in Turkey, Georgia, Tunisia, Macedonia, Latvia, Oman, Spain, Saudi Arabia, and internationally. It operates through Terminal Operations, Catering Operations, Duty Free Operations, Ground Handling and Bus Operations, and Other segments. The Terminal Operations segment operates terminal buildings, car parks, and general aviation terminals. This segment also engages in the ground handling operations, as well as operation of parking-apron-taxi ways. The Catering Operations segment manages food and beverage operations of the terminal for the passengers and the terminal personnel. The Duty Free Operations segment sells duty free goods for the international arriving and departing passengers. The Ground Handling and Bus Operations segment offers traffic, ramp, flight operation, cargo, and various other ground handling services for domestic and international flights; and operates buses. The Other segment provides lounge, IT, security and education, and airline taxi services. The company also provides software and system services. The company was formerly known as Tepe Akfen Vie Yatirim Yapim ve Isletme A.S. and changed its name to TAV Havalimanlari Holding A.S. in August 2006. TAV Havalimanlari Holding A.S. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

TAVHY.summary: TAV Havalimanlari Holding A.S., together with its subsidiaries, constructs terminal buildings, and manages and operates terminals or airports in Turkey, Georgia, Tunisia, Macedonia, Latvia, Oman, Spain, Saudi Arabia, and internationally. It operates through Terminal Operations, Catering Operations, Duty Free Operations, Ground Handling and Bus Operations, and Other segments. The Terminal Operations segment operates terminal buildings, car parks, and general aviation terminals. This segment also engages in the ground handling operations, as well as operation of parking-apron-taxi ways. The Catering Operations segment manages food and beverage operations of the terminal for the passengers and the terminal personnel. The Duty Free Operations segment sells duty free goods for the international arriving and departing passengers. The Ground Handling and Bus Operations segment offers traffic, ramp, flight operation, cargo, and various other ground handling services for domestic and international flights; and operates buses. The Other segment provides lounge, IT, security and education, and airline taxi services. The company also provides software and system services. The company was formerly known as Tepe Akfen Vie Yatirim Yapim ve Isletme A.S. and changed its name to TAV Havalimanlari Holding A.S. in August 2006. TAV Havalimanlari Holding A.S. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

TGSAS.IS.summary: TGS Dis Ticaret Anonim Sirketi provides brokering services for export activities of manufacturing and trade companies operating in Turkey. It also provides technical and logistic support services for export activities of manufacturing companies that engage in exports before banks and private financial institutions. TGS Dis Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1999 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

THYAO.IS.summary: TÃ¼rk Hava Yollari Anonim Ortakligi provides air transport and aircraft technical maintenance services in Turkey and internationally. The company offers domestic and international passenger and cargo air transportation services; and repair and maintenance, and technical and infrastructure support services related to aviation sector, as well as catering, and aviation ground handling services. It is also involved in training, airport operation and investment activities; manufacturing and trading of cabin interior accessories and aircraft seats; and trading of aviation fuel. The company was founded in 1933 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

TKFEN.IS.summary: Tekfen Holding Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, engages in contracting, agriculture, investment, and services businesses in Turkey and internationally. It specializes in the construction of petroleum, gas and petrochemical facilities, pipelines, land and sea terminals, tank farms, oil refineries, off-shore platforms, pumping and compressor stations, power plants, industrial facilities, highways, metro and railroad projects, sports complexes, infrastructure, and other civil engineering projects. The company is also involved in engineering, manufacturing, management, and agriculture-shipping agency services. In addition, it offers fertilizers, and seeds. Further, the company engages in the production of seedlings and saplings; and marine terminal services, and free zone and fuel station management. Additionally, it engages in the insurance brokerage and studio management businesses. Tekfen Holding Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1956 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

TKHVY.summary: TÃ¼rk Hava Yollari Anonim Ortakligi provides air transport and aircraft technical maintenance services in Turkey and internationally. The company offers domestic and international passenger and cargo air transportation services; and repair and maintenance, and technical and infrastructure support services related to aviation sector, as well as catering, and aviation ground handling services. It is also involved in training, airport operation and investment activities; manufacturing and trading of cabin interior accessories and aircraft seats; and trading of aviation fuel. The company was founded in 1933 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

TLMAN.IS.summary: Trabzon Liman Isletmeciligi Anonim Sirketi operates the Port of Trabzon connecting Europe and Asia. It offers jetty, dock, warehousing, machinery and equipment, pilotage and towage, sea vessels, service vehicles, and other services. The company is based in Trabzon, Turkey.

TMSN.IS.long_name: Tümosan Motor ve Traktör Sanayi A.S.
TMSN.IS.summary: TÃ¼mosan Motor ve TraktÃ¶r Sanayi A.S. engages in the production, marketing, and sale of diesel engines and tractors in Turkey and internationally. The company's diesel engines are used in tractors, automotive and cleaning equipment, generators, and marine vehicles. It also offers agricultural equipment, including front loaders, balers, mixer feeders, rotary power harrows, mulchers, fertilizer spreaders, pneumatic seed drills, inter row cultivators, maize choppers, rotary windrowers, rotary tedders and mowers, subsoilers, chisel ploughs, and cultivators, as well as mini rotary, side shifting rotary, and disc tillers. The company provides diesel and electric forklifts; and after-sale services. TÃ¼mosan Motor ve TraktÃ¶r Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. TÃ¼mosan Motor ve TraktÃ¶r Sanayi A.S. is a subsidiary of Eregli Tekstil Turizm Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.

TTRAK.IS.long_name: Türk Traktör ve Ziraat Makineleri A.S.
TTRAK.IS.summary: TÃ¼rk TraktÃ¶r ve Ziraat Makineleri A.S. manufactures and sells farm tractors, harvesters, and other agricultural machineries and equipment. The company also offers construction equipment, such as skid steer loaders, backhoe loaders, compact wheel loaders, wheel loaders, mini excavators, crawler excavators, and telehandlers. It offers tractors under the New Holland, Case IH, and Steyr brand names. In addition, the company provides after sale services. It sells its products through a network of 123 tractor dealers, 143 spare part dealers, and 42 construction equipment dealers in Turkey, as well as exports its products to approximately 130 countries. The company was formerly known as Minneapolis Moline TÃ¼rk TraktÃ¶r ve Ziraat Makineleri A.S. and changed its name to TÃ¼rk TraktÃ¶r ve Ziraat Makineleri A.S. in 1968. TÃ¼rk TraktÃ¶r ve Ziraat Makineleri A.S. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

TU5A.SG.short_name: Turk Hava Yollari A.S. Reg. Shs
TU5A.SG.summary: TÃ¼rk Hava Yollari Anonim Ortakligi provides air transport and aircraft technical maintenance services in Turkey and internationally. The company offers domestic and international passenger and cargo air transportation services; and repair and maintenance, and technical and infrastructure support services related to aviation sector, as well as catering, and aviation ground handling services. It is also involved in training, airport operation and investment activities; manufacturing and trading of cabin interior accessories and aircraft seats; and trading of aviation fuel. The company was founded in 1933 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

TUCLK.IS.long_name: Tugçelik Alüminyum Ve Metal Mamulleri Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.
TUCLK.IS.summary: TugÃ§elik AlÃ¼minyum Ve Metal Mamulleri Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells aluminum die casting parts in Turkey. The company also engages in the melting, die casting, mold production, CNC machining, and other production activities. It serves automotive, white goods, telecommunication, agricultural instruments, mechanic, and electric industries. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

TUREX.IS.summary: Tureks Turizm Tasimacilik Anonim Sirketi provides transport services to the public and private establishments in Turkey. It primarily offers personnel, public, and student transport services; fleet leasing solutions to corporate customers; and tourism services. The company as founded in 2002 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

UFUK.IS.long_name: UFUK Yatirim Yonetim ve Gayrimenkul A.S.
UFUK.IS.summary: UFUK Yatirim Yonetim ve Gayrimenkul A.S. invests in and finances small to large business projects in Turkey. The company was formerly known as Fon Sinai Yatirimlar A.S. and changed its name to UFUK Yatirim Yonetim ve Gayrimenkul A.S. in May 2016. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. UFUK Yatirim Yonetim ve Gayrimenkul A.S. is a subsidiary of Yildiz Holding A.S.

ULUSE.IS.long_name: Ulusoy Elektrik Imalat Taahhüt ve Ticaret A.S.
ULUSE.IS.summary: Ulusoy Elektrik Imalat TaahhÃ¼t ve Ticaret A.S. designs, manufactures, and sells solutions for electricity generation, transmission, and distribution systems primarily in Turkey. It offers metal enclosed modular, metal clad, and gas insulated switchgears; and compact transformer substations, medium voltage distribution transformers and switchgear components, and medium voltage cable accessories. The company also exports its products to approximately 70 countries. Ulusoy Elektrik Imalat TaahhÃ¼t ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey. Ulusoy Elektrik Imalat TaahhÃ¼t ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Eaton Industries XX Unlimited Company.

USAK.IS.summary: Usak Seramik Sanayi A.S. produces and sells ceramics in Turkey, the United States, Germany, Italy, Canada, and internationally. It offers ceramic wall, floor, and granite tiles; and kerb, decor, and porcelain products, as well as novelty products. The company was formerly known as Usak Elektro Porselen Sanayi A.S and changed its name to Usak Seramik Sanayi A.S. in 1986. Usak Seramik Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1972 and is based in Banaz, Turkey.

VAKFN.IS.summary: Vakif Finansal Kiralama A.S., together with its subsidiary, Varkif Sigorta Aracilik Hizmetleri Limited Sirketi, provides financial leasing services in Turkey. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Vakif Finansal Kiralama A.S. is a subsidiary of TÃ¼rkiye Vakiflar Bankasi TÃ¼rk Anonim Ortakligi.

YAYLA.IS.short_name: YAYLA EN. UR. TUR. VE INS
YAYLA.IS.long_name: Yayla Enerji Üretim Turizm ve Insaat Ticaret A.S.
YAYLA.IS.summary: Yayla Enerji Ãretim Turizm ve Insaat Ticaret A.S. operates in the building construction industry in Turkey. The company undertakes energy and tourism construction projects. It also invests in the renewable and clean energy projects. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

YYAPI.IS.summary: Yesil Yapi EndÃ¼strisi A.S. operates as a construction company in Turkey and internationally. It undertakes the construction of industrial plants, villas, commercial business centers, hospitals, housing projects, educational buildings, hotels, restoration and renovation projects, shopping malls, and cultural centers. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
